Introduction
This topic contains information about handling
VA Forms 21-0538
and
VA Forms 21P-0537
that are returned as undeliverable due to an erroneous address, including the actions to take when the correct address of the intended recipient of the form is
known
, or
unknown
.
title: M21-1, Part VII, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section B - Verification of Marital Status and the Status of Dependents
citation: Part VII, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section B
